bs_name.title: Setting Name
bs_name.description: Internal identifier for this setting, used as the key in the setup dict. Lowercase letters, digits, and underscores only. Example: 'escalate_policy', 'ad_account_id'.

bs_type.title: Input Type
bs_type.description: UI input control type. string_short: single-line text, string_long: wider single-line text, string_multiline: textarea, bool: checkbox, int/float: numeric input.

bs_default.title: Default Value
bs_default.description: Default value used when the admin has not provided an override in the setup dialog. Must match bs_type.

bs_group.title: Group
bs_group.description: Tab or panel name in the setup dialog UI. Settings with the same bs_group appear together. Example: 'Policy', 'Email', 'Message Filtering'.

bs_order.title: Order
bs_order.description: Sort position within the group. Lower numbers appear first. Example: 1, 2, 3.

bs_importance.title: Importance
bs_importance.description: Visibility priority in the setup dialog. 1 = highlighted as important for the admin to fill in, 0 = normal.

bs_description.title: Description
bs_description.description: Help text shown to the admin in the setup dialog explaining what this setting controls.
